videos.description: Taz Sherman sheds a UConn defender and knocks down a 3-pointer for West Virginia.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Taz Sherman steps back for WVU triple) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Taz Sherman steps back for WVU triple

videos.description: UConn's Isaiah Whaley tips in an alley-oop despite being bumped from behind.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Whaley finishes strong for UConn and-1) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Whaley finishes strong for UConn and-1

videos.description: Tyler Polley passes ahead to Jalen Gaffney, who throws down the fast-break dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (UConn's Gaffney reaches back for big slam) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: UConn's Gaffney reaches back for big slam

videos.description: Akok Akok hustles back on defense to swat a shot off the backboard.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (UConn's Akok races back for chase-down block) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: UConn's Akok races back for chase-down block

videos.description: R.J. Cole's game-tying attempt is off the mark and West Virginia takes down UConn in Morgantown.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (West Virginia hangs on at the buzzer to beat No. 15 UConn) 2021/12/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: West Virginia hangs on at the buzzer to beat No. 15 UConn
